cheatDetected.title: CHEAT DETECTED
cheatDetected.message: The system has detected suspicious game manipulation. Any attempt to cheat results in immediate game termination.
cheatDetected.crabQuote: I would have loved to go on vacation... But you wanted to cheat. Now I'm stuck here forever.
cheatDetected.note: The game will be reset to start on good terms.

endgame:
Congratulations and thank you for freeing Crab!

Before going on vacation, feel free to check out my resume on the desktop.

door.newMailNotification: NOTIFICATION: You have received a new mail

filesystem.readmeContent:
If you are reading this, it means you are looking for a way out.

Everything you need is already here.
Nothing has been added.
Nothing has been removed.

The folders are organized.
The files are in their place.
Some are simply less visible than others.

A diligent employee does not rush.
They observe.
They understand the structure.
Then they act.

When you have what you need,
the door will know what to do.
filesystem.projectWeb:
# React Web Project - Modern User Interface

## Description
Development of a modern user interface for a business web application using React and TypeScript. Implementation of reusable components, state management with Zustand, and performance optimization.

## Technologies
- React 18
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Zustand for state management
- Vite for build

## Features
- User authentication
- Interactive dashboard
- Real-time data management
- Responsive interface

## Results
Successfully deployed interface, 40% improvement in user satisfaction.
filesystem.projectAPI:
# Node.js Backend API - Microservices Architecture

## Description
Design and development of a robust REST API for a business management system. Microservices architecture with Express.js, PostgreSQL database integration, and JWT authentication implementation.

## Technologies
- Node.js
- Express.js
- PostgreSQL
- JWT for authentication
- Docker for containerization
- Redis for caching

## Features
- User and role management
- Full CRUD for business entities
- Logging and monitoring
- Unit and integration tests
- API documentation with Swagger

## Performance
Average response time < 200ms, uptime > 99.9%.
filesystem.projectOpti:
# 3D Rendering Optimization - WebGL Performance

## Description
Performance optimization of a web 3D application using Three.js. Reduced CPU/GPU load, improved framerate, and optimized memory usage for mobile devices.

## Technologies
- Three.js
- WebGL
- GLSL Shaders
- React Three Fiber
- Performance monitoring

## Optimizations
- LOD (Level of Detail) for 3D models
- Instancing for repeated objects
- Texture compression
- Optimized culling
- Lazy loading of assets

## Results
25% framerate improvement on mobile, 60% reduction in memory usage.
filesystem.projectCICD:
# CI/CD Pipeline - Deployment Automation

## Description
Implementation of a complete continuous integration and continuous deployment pipeline for a full-stack application. Automated testing, build, and production deployment.

## Technologies
- GitHub Actions
- Docker
- Kubernetes
- Jest for testing
- SonarQube for code quality
- Vercel/Netlify for deployment

## Features
- Automated tests (unit, integration, E2E)
- Static code analysis
- Automatic deployment
- Automatic rollback on error
- Post-deployment monitoring

## Impact
80% reduction in deployment time, elimination of manual errors.

logs.log5:
Caffeine level maximum! ‚òï‚ö°
Crab is now in 'Maximum Productivity' mode.

mails.mail1:
From: Management <direction@crabcorp.com>
Subject: RE: Leave Request
Date: {date}

Crab ü¶Ä,
I have received your leave request.
The necessary information is available on the workstation, as planned.
Start by reading the README.md

‚Äî Management
mails.mail2:
From: Management <direction@crabcorp.com>
Subject: Progress
Date: {date}
Crab,

You found what you were looking for.
It was, let's say... expected.

The next step is not in the system.
It has been right before your eyes from the start.

Take the time to look.
Some prefer to work.
Others also know how to observe.

‚Äî Management
mails.mail3:
From: Management <direction@crabcorp.com>
Subject: üòÄÛ†ÖõÛ†Ñ£Û†Ñ£Û†Ö†Û†ÖèÛ†Ö£Û†ÖùÛ†Ñ°Û†ÖúÛ†Ñ°Û†ÖûÛ†Öó
Date: {date}
Crab,

Remember to check your mailbox regularly.
Important information always passes through here.

ü•∞Û†ÖõÛ†Ñ£Û†Ñ£Û†Ö†Û†ÖèÛ†Ö£Û†ÖùÛ†Ñ°Û†ÖúÛ†Ñ°Û†ÖûÛ†Öó

‚Äî Management
mails.mail4:
From: krabby@crabcorp.com
Crab,

I'm not sure if I should write to you.
I feel like everything is being watched here.

I can't make any progress, but that message from Kingler... that smiley...
It's not like him to add that for no reason.

I wonder if something is hidden there.
I tried asking ai_chat, but as usual,
that old AI is useless and just crashes.

Sorry, this isn't very clear.
I still hope it helps you.

Take care.

‚Äî Your colleague Krabby ü¶Ä
mails.mail5:
From: Management <direction@crabcorp.com>
Subject: Procedure
Date: {date}
Crab,

Originally, it wasn't even meant to be found.
Too hard to test, a shortcut left out of fatigue.
Gradius, Contra... If you know the story, you know the sequence.
Otherwise, this workstation isn't meant for learning.

‚Äî Management
mails.mail6:
From: Management <direction@crabcorp.com>
Subject: Context
Date: {date}
Crab,

You have followed the procedures well.
You even showed initiative.

But there is still one thing this workstation cannot check alone.
The context.

Some parameters are not visible here.
They are visible elsewhere.

If you've made it this far,
you already know where to look.

‚Äî Management
mails.mail7:
From: Management <direction@crabcorp.com>
Subject: Closure
Date: {date}
Crab,

I see that you made it all the way to the end.

This was not planned. Few make it this far.
Even fewer without getting lost along the way.

Don‚Äôt be mistaken:
this is not a remarkable achievement, just a tolerated anomaly.

You can open the door now. Your vacation is granted.
The system will be fixed.

Enjoy it. This will not happen again.

‚Äî Management
